title: Ayurvedic Medicine
author: Willen de Souza; Wds Design
cleaned_text: is a type of Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) therapy. Also called Ayurveda. Ayurvedic Medicine is a form of alternative medicine that is the traditional system of medicine in India and seeks to treat and integrate body, mind, and spirit using a comprehensive holistic approach especially by emphasizing diet, herbal remedies, exercise, meditation, breathing, and therapeutic massage.
